main.name: Vinson Ly
main.description: interested in the Cloud, FinTech and the Blockchain industry, with many relevant projects under my belt. I am currently seeking for a Software Engineering internship position, starting in January 2020. If you would like to chat, feel free to reach out at any one of my social outlets below
main.bio: I'm an outgoing, Software Engineer with a passion for developing products that have real-world impact. I am most experienced with web development, using React and NodeJS or Flask. I have a huge interest in Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies and am currently serving as the Director of Technology at SFU Blockchain. I am interested in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning and am excited to see how these revolutionary technologies will shape the future of the world. If we share any common interests, please feel free to react out on LinkedIn and we can chat!
main.contactmessage: If you would like to get in contact with me, please fill out the form and I will email you back at my earliest convienience.

resume.skillmessage: I am well versed in Web Development and am actively learning everyday to broaden my knowledge on various technologies such as Blockchain Technology and Machine Learning.

minor.description: A program that established a basic foundation in business principles.

education.description: A program that focuses on the development of high-quality software for the public and private industry.

work.title: Software Development Intern
description: Full stack web developer responsible for client side and server side development, DevOps, and Quality Assurance of the Web Service Assessment Portal(WASP) app for SAP GTLC â€“ Vancouver
Implemented and deployed to production a complete Commercial Software Review application within WASP
Increased efficiency of web service reviews done by Compliance Analysts by 200%
Resolved over 200 bug tickets and implemented 10 features in a span of four months
Implemented a streamlined software development process that improved team productivity by 80%
Managed deployment of code onto testing and production servers
Assumed the role of Scrum Master and designed techincal solutions to satisfy business requirements from Business Analysts

work.title: Full Stack & AI Developer (Coop)
description: Responsible for client side and server side web app development for the Porton Telemedicine Web App
Developed a live video chat system that served as a core feature in the Porton Telemedicine Web App
Integrated health organizations and employers into the Porton Telemedicine Web App that allowed the company to onboard entire organizations, rather than individual doctors
Designed testing workflows to ensure incoming features do not break existing functionality

extracurriculars.org: Scouts Canada (99th SFX East Vancouver Scout Group)
extracurriculars.title: Colony Section Head
extracurriculars.description: I manage and oversee the operations of the Colony Section in the 99th East Vancouver SFX Scout Group. I plan events, run meetings, and host workshops for over 50 registered youth in the Scout group.

projects.title: Coinbay - Classifieds Listing Web App
projects.category: A classifieds listing web app with custom built-in Ethereum blockchain cryptocurrency payment and escrow solution. Our custom Ethereum Smart Contract prevents users from bailing after a deal and allows sellers to sell with confidence. Deployed to AWS.

projects.title: Savour
projects.category: A decentralized food-sharing marketplace that allows home-cooks to list their delicious home-cooked meals in a trustless, decentralized manner. Payments are fulfilled using our decentralized escrow service, built with Ethereum Smart Contracts

projects.title: Savor - Budget Tracker & Lifestyle Web App
projects.category: A budget tracker app that syncs with the user's bank account, providing hassle free budget tracking.

projects.title: Cryptocurrency Trading Bot
projects.category: An automated cryptocurrency trading bot, built with NodeJS to automatically place buy and sell orders, using a custom technical analysis algorithm.

projects.category: A personal website built using ReactJS
